attributes.action: Allow the people of the country to vote on legalisation of cannabis
attributes.additional_details: The laws around production sale and possession all need to be taken a closer look at and decriminalized upon successful vote of the public. We deserve the right to this worldwide proved medicine we understand fully the dangers associated with this drug and it's no mystery to anybody that cannabis could be harmful upon abuse just as alcohol and ciggerets can cause harm both physically and mentally through regulation announce the dangers and risks associated we MUST change NOW IS THE TIME.
attributes.background: Allow the people to have a vote on the legalisation of cannabis it is no secret to the people of the nation that we are the biggest exporter of legal cannabis in the world so why shouldn't we have the oppertunity to vote on our right to smoke?
